1: <mistake>du</mistake> kha <mistake>tsa</mistake> <mistake>da</mistake> <mistake>bradzwA</mistake> <mistake>dzan</mistake> <mistake>mrta</mistake> <mistake>ye/ d+wAan</mistake> <mistake>kAM</mistake> ya <mistake>lu+A</mistake> <mistake>gyA</mistake> <mistake>shAa</mistake> ra <mistake>a r</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> tsa <mistake>n'Aa</mistake> <mistake>ya te</mistake> na <mistake>m@//sgkha</mistake> 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par <mistake>byad</mistake> chub pa'i rim pa tshigs su bcad pa <mistake>gsuma</mistake> <mistake>mo//'di</mistake> <mistake>lar</mistake> <mistake>sangs/</mistake>
2: rgyas bcom <mistake>ldin</mistake> <mistake>'das //rdzogs</mistake> <mistake>pa'isangs</mistake> rgyas a yig <mistake>byung //a</mistake> yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen 'gyur med dam pa <mistake>yin//srog</mistake> chen po ste skye ba <mistake>med/tshig</mistake> tu brjod pa <mistake>spas</mistake>
3: pa <mistake>ste//rdzod</mistake> pa kun gyi rgyu yi <mistake>mchog /tsheg</mistake> kun rab tu gsal par <mistake>byed//mchod</mistake> pa chen po 'dod chags <mistake>che//sems</mistake> can thams cad dga' bar <mistake>byed//mchod</mistake> pa chen po <mistake>zhesdngng</mistake> <mistake>che//nyon</mistake> <mistake>modgs</mistake>
4: kun gyi <mistake>dga</mistake> che <mistake>ba//mchod</mistake> pa chen po gti mug <mistake>che/ /ga ti</mistake> mug <mistake>bla</mistake> ste gti mug <mistake>sel// mchod</mistake> pa chen po khro ba <mistake>che//kho</mistake> ba chen po <mistake>dgra</mistake> <mistake>che</mistake> <mistake>ba// mchod</mistake> pa <mistake>chaen</mistake> po chags pa <mistake>che//chags</mistake> pa thams cad
5: sel bar <mistake>byed//'dod</mistake> pa chen po bde ba <mistake>che// dga'</mistake> ba chen po mgu ba <mistake>che// gzugs</mistake> <mistake>ce</mistake> lus kyang che ba <mistake>ste //kha</mistake> dog che zhing lus bong <mistake>che//ming</mistake> yang che zhing rgya che <mistake>ba/dkyil</mistake> 'khor chen po
6: yangs pa <mistake>ya ni//shes</mistake> rab chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> mtshon 'chang <mistake>ba//nyon</mistake> mongs lcags <mistake>kya</mistake> che ba'i <mistake>mchog /grags</mistake> chen snyan grags chen <mistake>po</mistake> <mistake>te //snang</mistake> ba chen po gsal ba <mistake>che//mkhas</mistake> <mistake>ha</mistake> <mistake>sgyu</mistake> 'phrul chen
7: po 'chang // sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub <mistake>pa//sgyu</mistake> 'phrul <mistake>tshen</mistake> po dga' bas <mistake>dga'o//sgyu</mistake> 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul <mistake>can //sbyin</mistake> <mistake>bdeag</mistake> chen po gtso bo <mistake>ste//tsul</mistake> khrims chen po <mistake>chang</mistake> ba'i mchog
8: bzod chen <mistake>' chodg</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> brtan pa <mistake>ste//brtson</mistake> 'grus chen po <mistake>pa</mistake> rol <mistake>gnon//bsam</mistake> gtan chen po <mistake>tng</mistake> 'dzin <mistake>gnas//shes</mistake> rab chen po lus 'chang ba // stobs po <mistake>the</mistake> la thabs che <mistake>ba //smon</mistake>
